properties.value: Wesley is a small man found outside Zahur's home in Nardah, just south of the fountain. For 50 coins per item (noted items work), he will crush items that requires the use of a pestle and mortar, such as unicorn horns, blue dragon scales, bird nests and chocolate bars. He can crush all items in one go, so if a player is willing to pay, you can save considerable time using him instead of crushing the items yourself.

Advanced data
NPC ID7369

Wesley is a small man found outside Zahur's home in Nardah, just south of the fountain. For 50 coins per item (noted items work), he will crush items that requires the use of a pestle and mortar, such as unicorn horns, blue dragon scales, bird nests and chocolate bars. He can crush all items in one go, so if a player is willing to pay, you can save considerable time using him instead of crushing the items yourself.

He used to work on a big ship, exploring the world with his mother. However, he did not do very well at the fleet's training school, so he quit and moved to Nardah, where he found his true passion: crushing stuff.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • He is a reference to the character Wesley Crusher from the television series Star Trek: The Next Generation.
  • His overhead dialogue of Gotta crush 'em all. is a reference to Pokémon's catch phrase "Gotta catch 'em all".
